infoPlist.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: Mahi needs access to your calendar to detect scheduled workouts and help you complete your daily goals.
infoPlist.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Mahi would like to access your health data to track your workouts and help you maintain your streak. (Coming soon)
infoPlist.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Mahi would like to write workout data to Apple Health. (Coming soon)

plugins.calendarPermission: Allow Mahi to access your calendar to detect scheduled workouts and help you complete your daily goals.
